General.Name: NINGBO HENGSHUAI Co. LTD.
General.Description: Ningbo Hengshuai Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive micro-motors and components worldwide. It offers OEM products, including washer pumps; washer systems, such as level sensors and nozzles; and micro motors, including pump, actuator, and fan motors, as well as aftermarket products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Ningbo, China. Ningbo Hengshuai Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Ningbo Hengshuai Investment Management Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 399, Tong Ning Road, Ningbo, China, 315033
